description.value: You install a secondary lobe in your brain that can shore up your mental faculties when your mind is compromised. At the beginning of your turn, you can spend 1 Resolve Point (this doesn’t require an action) to ignore one of the following conditions until the beginning of your next turn: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.8rIj0ewW4bL8Uph5]{confused}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{frightened}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{shaken}. Alternatively, at the beginning of your turn, you can spend 2 Resolve Points (this doesn’t require an action) to ignore one of the following conditions until the beginning of your next turn: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4WXJOFZ4s7TJUW6D]{cowering}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.2XWEujYSyryB4oHm]{dazed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{panicked}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{stunned}. If you spend any Resolve Points in this fashion, you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{staggered }until the beginning of your next turn. The condition still functions normally for the purposes of duration and removing it.
